body_html:
Thanks for looking into this!
I've been reading the code, and writing a custom Estimator would involve essentially copy-pasting
_infer_model(), _get_predict_ops() and _logits(), which would be very brittle, considering how fast this code is changing. Would you be interested in a pull request that modifies BaseEstimator to optionally return these?

body:
Thanks for looking into this!
I've been reading the code, and writing a custom Estimator would involve essentially copy-pasting 
`_infer_model()`, `_get_predict_ops()` and `_logits()`, which would be very brittle, considering how fast this code is changing. Would you be interested in a pull request that modifies `BaseEstimator` to optionally return these?
